Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Foreign politicians don't have resources - or limited resources. It's useless dealing with them

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: My mission in life is to preserve craftsmanship

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are often a lot less vindictive than women are, because we are rejected constantly every day

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the cool thing is doing things that could only be done in gaming

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't learn so good, no matter how good the teacher is

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Look first at management. That's the key to a company

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming a dad means you have to be a role model for your son and be someone he can look up to

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Better than any argument is to rise at dawn and pick dew-wet red berries in a cup

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Eternal vigilance is the price of liberty; power is ever stealing from the many to the few

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's make sure that we are working for age-appropriate sex education in our school system

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: People are everything in education, just as in the corporate world

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: My character in 'Prison Break' needs to be formidable. In reality, I'm not very tough at all

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: How can you have 'Scream' without Ghostface? It's like 'Friday the 13th' without Jason

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see myself as extremely handsome. I just figure I can charm you into liking me

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it preferable not to have public opinions about anything. It's good for me to shut up

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I have priorities. Maintaining my daughter is my first

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Normal is nothing more than a cycle on a washing machine

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Defect-free software does not exist

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think one of the most poignant things is unrequited love and loneliness

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I am happy because I'm grateful. I choose to be grateful. That gratitude allows me to be happy

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Inappropriate behavior makes me laugh

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: It is more rewarding to be complicit with scarcity than excess

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love fashion. I shop like a 16-year old girl. Sneakers. That's what I spend money I don't have on

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all right-listening folk, I am an implacable enemy of all muzak

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The first step is you have to say that you can

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born and raised in the ghetto, on welfare, two minutes from homeless

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Thanksgiving just gets me all warm and tingly and all kinds of wonderful inside

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a real wisdom to not saying a thing

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Where hast thou wandered, gentle gale, to find the perfumes thou dost bring?

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Ford comes first before everything else I do in my life

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Glory, built on selfish principles, is shame and guilt

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it worth while to observe that there are no Venetian blinds in Venice?

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Justice delayed is justice denied

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: Fix your eyes on perfection and you make almost everything speed towards it

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: To buy very good wine nowadays requires only money. To serve it to your guests is a sign of fatigue

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Time moves in one direction, memory in another

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: He that loves reading has everything within his reach

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaks and whispers are a daily routine of news-gathering in Washington

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: I have found that I get a better reaction from people once I am less bothered about their reaction

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: As the Republican platforms says, the welfare of the farmer is vital to that of the whole country

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: We'd like to prearrange our life on all levels. We'd prefer it to be scripted. But it's not

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the man who disciplines himself strictly can stand for long the terrific pace of modern war

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: In a start-up company, you basically throw out all assumptions every three weeks

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The Constitution is not neutral. It was designed to take the government off the backs of people

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of education is the knowledge not of facts but of values

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: Never assume the obvious is true

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to create your life. You have to carve it, like a sculpture

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: A miser grows rich by seeming poor; an extravagant man grows poor by seeming rich

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: War is cruelty. There is no use trying to reform it. The crueler it is, the sooner it will be over

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: The courts are truly the least dangerous of the three branches of our government

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: Without censorship, things can get terribly confused in the public mind

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Stills belong in the lobby, not on the screen

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to be led astray when you're so broken. People take advantage of you

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're young, the blue blazer feels like a grown-up costume

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: They throw the ball, I hit it. They hit the ball, I catch it

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: A World Series trophy is a wonderful thing to behold

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't talk about yourself; it will be done when you leave

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of peer critique, of talking about each other's art - I just found it so useless

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to grow up sometime

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep up the good work, if only for a while, if only for the twinkling of a tiny galaxy

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: A tiger does not shout its tigritude, it acts

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: My rule of thumb is that if I am interested or intrigued by something, others will be as well

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: Italian food is all about ingredients and it's not fussy and it's not fancy

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The history of liberty is a history of resistance

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: A grownup is a child with layers on

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not very smart, but I recognize that I am not very smart

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Marley stood for universal peace and love. He tried to break racial barriers

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother made the best scrambled eggs, super-loose and soft

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to fill your cup. You then give away the overflowing, but you keep a cupful for yourself

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: We always hear about the rights of democracy, but the major responsibility of it is participation

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning the peace is harder than winning the war

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: In life, you need a house and a car. After that, you have a choice

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: If knowledge and foresight are too penetrating and deep, unify them with ease and sincerity

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: All the jokes in my films, the comedy, they're not me, I just try to hold a big mirror up to us

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: My fate is in the hands of almighty Allah

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not deal with threats and ultimatums

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Men and women are immigrants in each other's worlds

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: My mantra is simple: work gets you work, and good work gets you good work

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes women who are supposed to be strong are also written as mean and vindictive

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: Not only am I constantly seeking better performance but also to be a better person, to be respected

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm looking at a dead event and trying to give it new life. In a sense, I'm a taxidermist

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: You arrive at a village, and in this calm environment, one starts to hear echo

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: Polka dots are fabulous

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't sit under the tattoo gun unless I'm sold on it completely and it will define me as a person

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Time has a way of demonstrating that the most stubborn are the most intelligent

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: Jerusalem is united, will never be divided again

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - Good things happen when you meet strangers

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: When you arrive at a fork in the road, take it

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't born with a golden spoon in my mouth. It was a really tough life

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Seasonality in winter doesn't have to mean sleep-inducing, stew-like, starchy casseroles

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: I started rapping when I was about 12 or 13, just playing around with it

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: My hustle is nonstop. I never stop hustling

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to be like Bill Gates, bro. With all the money in the world

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: When the slaves left Africa, they left us this music. They left us blues

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: My label understands that I am really attached to Malaysia, that I come home a lot

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not an oligarch. I am a servant and I try to align my interests and those of my investors

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is a tool that either allows us to create new markets or disrupt existing ones

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashions fade, style is eternal

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel lucky that I got to work with some of the big legends in town

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, country music has always been the home for a great song

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: I've grown up a lot, I'm on my own, and I've learned some valuable life lessons

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is killing women's body image of themselves

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: Spontaneity is what travel is all about

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I always encourage over-tipping if you can afford it because... share the wealth

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am going to be the next Ryan Gosling

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The library was the place I went to find out what there was to know. It was absolutely essential

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: What's nice about concrete is that it looks unfinished

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only one Sabbath guitarist and he is the architect for everything, Tony Iommi

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: We're here for a little, little bit of time, and I just wanna make the most out of it

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a princess anyway so I find that quite weird to be labelled as one

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is very black and white for me. I don't really like playing mind games

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: We now have the opportunity of giving to the USSR its Vietnam war

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: You have already disarmed my men without my knowledge, are their arms to be returned or not?

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born an auntie. I have an older niece and nephew and many younger nieces and nephews

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: Piracy has destroyed the domestic market

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will

Quote.Author: Ziggy Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: Alcohol, tobacco, and pharmaceutical drugs are legal, but they can hurt a lot of people

Quote.Author: Zinedine Zidane
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a need to play intensely every day, to fight every match hard

Quote.Author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic
Quote.QuoteValue: You never forget where you come from

Quote.Author: Zoe Foster Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person

Quote.Author: Zoe Kazan
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing's going to come to you by sitting around and waiting for it

Quote.Author: Zoe Kravitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy to just sit in a cafe and watch people. It's my favorite thing to do, for sure

Quote.Author: Zoe Liste
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I'm a big lipstick girl - I'm old school that way

Quote.Author: Zoe Saldana
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm learning the power of going away for the weekend and keeping myself company

Quote.Author: Zoe Sugg
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good for me to do things outside my comfort zone and push myself

Quote.Author: Zooey Deschanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Summer has always been my favorite season. I feel happier

Quote.Author: Zora Neale Hurston
Quote.QuoteValue: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose

Quote.Author: Zosia Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy arises out of necessity, because some things are so dark that you have to laugh about it

Quote.Author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
Quote.QuoteValue: Being jealous of a beautiful woman is not going to make you more beautiful

Quote.Author: Zubin Mehta
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Persian Jew, and we don't speak Hebrew

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is the tie that binds, and binds, and binds

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: In olden times sacrifices were made at the altar - a practice which is still continued

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest task in a girl's life is to prove to a man that his intentions are serious

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: Somehow a bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever

Quote.Author: Helen Rowland
Quote.QuoteValue: The tenderest spot in a man's make-up is sometimes the bald spot on top of his head

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Affliction comes to us, not to make us sad but sober; not to make us sorry but wise

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Adapt or perish, now as ever, is nature's inexorable imperative

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: What really matters is what you do with what you have

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing leads so straight to futility as literary ambitions without systematic knowledge

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Human history in essence is the history of ideas

Quote.Author: H. G. Wells
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder

Quote.Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote.QuoteValue: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power

Quote.Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote.QuoteValue: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm

Quote.Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote.QuoteValue: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is a source of great strength

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides

Quote.Author: Lao Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever you go, go with all your heart

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is a true friend who never betrays

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger

Quote.Author: Confucius
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to commit myself about heaven and hell - you see, I have friends in both places

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother had a great deal of trouble with me, but I think she enjoyed it

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company

Quote.Author: Mark Twain
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: You must be the change you wish to see in the world

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: A nation's culture resides in the hearts and in the soul of its people

Quote.Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: What we think, we become

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection

Quote.Author: Buddha
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind is everything. What you think you become

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: I can resist everything except temptation

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are made to be loved, not understood

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Memory... is the diary that we all carry about with us

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: True friends stab you in the front

Quote.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: A gentleman is one who never hurts anyone's feelings unintentionally

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: They do not love that do not show their love

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: We know what we are, but know not what we may be

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: If music be the food of love, play on

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: No legacy is so rich as honesty

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: When a father gives to his son, both laugh; when a son gives to his father, both cry

Quote.Author: William Shakespeare
Quote.QuoteValue: What's in a name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to dream before your dreams can come true

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: You see, God helps only people who work hard. That principle is very clear

Quote.Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence is a continuous process and not an accident

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift
